summary: Some recipients of federal grants and contracts say the accompanying paperwork can be duplicative and burdensome. The Office of Management and Budget led a pilot on how to reduce the reporting burden for grants and contracts. The grants portion of the pilot found ways to reduce reporting time and duplication, and resulted in OMB's issuing guidance. However, we found that the contracts portion of the...
title: Data Act: Pilot Effectively Tested Approaches for Reducing Reporting Burden for Grants but Not for Contracts
